column1: '''William Auld''' ([[6 November]] [[1924]] – [[11 September]] [[2006]]) was a Scottish poet
column3: translator and magazine editor who wrote chiefly in [[Esperanto]]. Auld translated ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and contributed to the translation of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' into Esperanto.

column1: *''[[La mastro de l' ringoj]]'' (''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'')
**[[1995]]: ''La kunularo de l' ringo'' (''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'')
**[[1997]]: ''La reveno de la reĝo'' ([[The Return of the King]]'')
*[[2000]]: ''[[La hobito]]'' (''[[The Hobbit]]''; with [[Christopher Gledhill]]; Auld translated the poems and songs)
